data.name: Missile Input
data.detailed_description:
UFO sighting reports have grown exponentially the last few months, and the secret service is spread too thin to devise convincing cover-ups for all of them. The solution? Enlist the help of Lucas Brazier; a former brass worker turned surface-to-air missile specialist. As the newest recruit in the fleet of AA-privateers, your job is to shoot down any and all UFOs spotted in the sky.

Will You Follow Orders?





  • Fast-paced typing gameplay with multiple difficulties

  • Special missiles and equipment to buy

  • Time of day and weather that affects gameplay

  • Two factions to help, destroy or forego

  • Multiple endings

  • Aliens




Be quick on the keyboard, these launch codes won't enter themselves!

data.short_description: Missile Input is an action-packed typing game where you shoot down UFOs, planes, birds and more from your missile base. Unlock special equipment and face an ever-increasing fleet of enemies. Chase the highscore or take part in an evolving storyline, dynamically influenced by your actions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
